Circular No. 19/2006 
 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No.29/2002 dated 24.09.2002 the Personal 
Security Officers (PSOs) of Shri Arjun Singh, Union Minister for HRD, Government of 
India are permitted to carry their weapons and ammunition on their persons or in their 
hand baggage on board the flight.  The weapons will be carried in fully unloaded 
condition i.e. weapons and ammunition shall be kept separately while accompanying the 
dignitary on board the aircraft.  
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
